Reiki Training Salt Lake City

Reiki Training in Salt Lake City

Call now to schedule a set up a time to heal your mind, body, and spirit.

Call Us (385) 483-2264

Welcome to Reiki Light Training!

At Reiki Light, we believe that anyone can learn the healing power of Reiki. We offer Reiki Training courses to teach you everything you need to know to become a knowledgeable Reiki practitioner.

Our Reiki Training courses are designed for anyone who wants to deepen their understanding of energy healing. Whether you're a seasoned practitioner or just starting out. We offer courses at different levels, including:

  • Reiki Level 1
  • Reiki Level 2
  • Usui Holy Fire® III Reiki I & II Training
  • Reiki Master Teacher Training
  • and more.

Get a Free, no obligation, discussion with a Reiki Healer

Reiki Training Classes & Levels

At Reiki Light, we believe that anyone can learn the healing power of Reiki.

Call Us (385) 483-2264

Reiki Level 1

Our Reiki Level 1 course is perfect for beginners who are interested in learning the basics of Reiki healing. In this course, you'll learn about the history of Reiki, the principles of energy healing, and the fundamentals of Reiki hand positions. You'll also have the opportunity to practice Reiki healing. You'll receive a Reiki Level 1 certification upon completion of the course.

Reiki Level 2

Our Reiki Level 2 course is designed for students who have completed Reiki Level 1 and want to deepen their understanding of Reiki healing. In this course, you'll learn about the three Reiki symbols and how to use them in your healing practice. You'll also learn advanced techniques for distance healing, as well as additional Reiki hand positions. Upon completion of this course, you'll receive a Reiki Level 2 certification.

Reiki Master Teachers

For Reiki Master Teachers, we offer a comprehensive Reiki Master Teacher Training course. This course will teach you everything you need to know to teach Reiki. This includes advanced Reiki techniques, how to attune others to Reiki energy, and how to create your own Reiki courses. Upon completion of this course, you'll be certified as a Reiki Master Teacher.

In-Person & Live Virtual Classes

At Reiki Light, we understand that everyone learns differently, which is why we offer both in-person and live virtual classes. We have in-person classes that provide a hands-on learning experience. Our live virtual classes are conducted online, allowing you to participate in the course from the comfort of your own home.

The thing that sets us apart from other Reiki training providers is our commitment to helping others become Reiki practitioners. That's why we offer a referral program for our students. If you refer someone to one of our Reiki training courses and they sign up, you'll receive a discount on your next course. We believe that by helping others learn Reiki, we can create a more compassionate and connected world.

If you're interested in deepening your understanding of Reiki healing or becoming a certified Reiki practitioner, we invite you to explore our Reiki Training courses. With our experienced instructors, comprehensive curriculum, and flexible learning options, we're confident that we can help you achieve your Reiki training goals. Contact us today at (385) 483-2264 to learn more!
